response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Sum of Digits\", \"description\": \"Write a function `sum_digits` that takes a non-negative integer as input and returns the sum of its digits.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef sum_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A non-negative integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of the digits of the input integer.\", \"code\": \"def sum_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n    sum = 0\\n    while n > 0:\\n        sum += n % 10\\n        n //= 10\\n    return sum\", \"tests\": [\"assert sum_digits(123) == 6\", \"assert sum_digits(9) == 9\", \"assert sum_digits(10) == 1\", \"assert sum_digits(12345) == 15\"] }"
